channel.title: Proxmox Setup - David Vargas
channel.description: Add the following to the end of /etc/apt/sources.list # not for production use deb http://download.proxmox.com/debian/pve bullseye pve-no-subscriptionYou may need to replace this for your current version. See https://pve.proxmox.com/wiki/Package_Repositories This will download “unstable” updates for proxmox. Next, open pve-enterprise.list if you do not have a subscription. This lets you avoid subscription errors. vim /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pve-enterprise.listThen add a “#” to comment out this line: # deb https://enterprise.proxmox.com/debian/pve bullseye pve-enterprise Then, update the lists:apt-get update
